name: SecOps Alert Investigation Agent
description: Investigates enriched security alerts by querying logs, correlating events, and assessing impact.

authSchemes.description: No authentication required for this internal POC agent.

skills.name: Investigate Enriched Alert
skills.description: Takes standardized alert data and enrichment results, performs investigation steps (e.g., log queries via MCP Proxy), and returns findings.

enrichment.description: Enrichment results for IOCs in the alert.

confidence.description: Confidence score (0.0-1.0) that this is a true positive requiring action.

details.description: Structured details, e.g., correlated events, affected assets.
